TopicTitle: Breaking ground science parts becoming very tiny after placing them

Articles.Content:
Encountered this while testing for a Mun mission. Every time I place a breaking ground DLC part down it resizes to an extremely small size for some reason and its been puzzling me. Any ideas on what's going on? Here's ksp.log and a video of it. (don't mind bill scratching his crack) Yes I have tweakscale, and I've added a few lines to a .cfg  that adds tweakscale to every part. I don't know if this is causing the problem, and if it is, is there a way to add exceptions to all the breaking ground parts? Thanks!
